testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to Register page..............................................passed When User enter valid data..................................................passed Then User able to register successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User enter to login page..............................................passed When User Enter valid username and valid password...........................passed Then User able to login successfully........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: User login with invalid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given User enter to login page..............................................passed When User enter invalid username and password...............................passed Then User could not able to login...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Currencies | users could change the currency
testcase.name: user need to change the currency to ERU
testcase.system-out: When User click on Currency dropdownlist and select Euro....................passed Then Euro Symbol is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page..........passed

testcase.name: User need to search with valid keyword
User need to search with valid keyword 2
User need to search with valid keyword 3
User need to search with sku
testcase.system-out: When user search with "NK_FRC_RS"...........................................passed And click on product image..................................................passed Then Page should be appeared with sku.......................................passed

testcase.classname: User want to click on subelement
testcase.name: User Click on Sub-element
testcase.system-out: When User click on Parent and select sub....................................passed
